00014 JsonParserPrivate::writeNetworkName(const Aki::Server::Ptr& server, QVariantMap* map)

00020 JsonParserPrivate::writeReconnection(const Aki::Server::Ptr& server, QVariantMap* map)

00040 JsonParserPrivate::writeConnectionOptions(const Aki::Server::Ptr& server, QVariantMap* map)

00090 void
00091 JsonParserPrivate::writeEncoding(const Aki::Server::Ptr& server, QVariantMap* map)
00092 {
00093     QVariantMap encodingMap;
00094     encodingMap.insert(QLatin1String("enable"), server->isDefaultEncodingEnabled());
00095     encodingMap.insert(QLatin1String("defaultEncoding"), server->encoding());
00096     map->insert(QLatin1String("encoding"), encodingMap);
00097 }

00099 void
00100 JsonParserPrivate::writeIdentity(const Aki::Server::Ptr& server, QVariantMap* map)
00101 {
00102     QVariantMap identityMap;
00103     identityMap.insert(QLatin1String("enable"), server->isAutoIdentifyEnabled());
00104     QVariantMap identity;
00105     identity.insert(QLatin1String("serviceName"), server->serviceName());
00106     identity.insert(QLatin1String("servicePassword"), server->servicePassword());
00107     identityMap.insert(QLatin1String("identity"), identity);
00108     map->insert(QLatin1String("identity"), identityMap);
00109 }

00111 void
00112 JsonParserPrivate::readNetwork(QVariantMap serverMap)
00113 {
00114     const int count = serverMap.count();
00115 
00116     for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00117         Aki::Server::Ptr ptr(new Aki::Server);
00118 
00119         QVariantMap server = serverMap[QString(QLatin1String("server%1")).arg(i)].toMap();
00120         readNetworkName(ptr, server);
00121     }
00122 }

00124 void
00125 JsonParserPrivate::readNetworkName(Server::Ptr& server, QVariantMap serverMap)
00126 {
00127     server->setName(serverMap[QLatin1String("name")].toString());
00128 }
